member.name: IMFCaptureSink2.SetOutputMediaType
member.summary: Dynamically sets the output media type of the record sink or preview sink.
member.param: The stream index to change the output media type on.
The new encoder attributes. This can be null.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: The sink does not support the media type.

member.name: IMFCaptureSink2
member.summary: Extends the interface to provide functionality for dynamically setting the output media type of the record sink or preview sink.
